App Recognition: An app to recognize unused apps and remove it
Wifi-4g Switcher: Recognize you are near your favorite places and switch from wifi-4g and vice versa
Whatsapp Bot: A free whatsapp bot to answer the most commom questions
Near Food: App for recognize the most near market with food almost to due date
Gas Weight Notifier: IoT app to listen to the gas weight and order a new gas automatically
Peltier heat map: Iot wear app to notify a graph using real heat
Mobile Franchising: Uber app of mobile franchising such as bikeshops and foodtrucks and find the next one
Arch On Demand: Continuous delivery of archtecture projects using unity and sketch up
